summary: Hylian Shield and Dark Shield — now standalone mod.  Now with the large, heavy variant, and actually optimized textures.  Version 1.3
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/M4K8RVc.png[/img]
The Hylian Shield and Dark Shield meshes and textures have been made to look like the version from Breath of the Wild/Skyward Sword (they're the same design).



I also have plans to eventually make some other shields from Breath of the Wild once I have more free time, oh college...


[img]https://i.imgur.com/lG9iCB2.png[/img]
Version 1.3
• Optimized textures, 80.6% file size reduction.
• Improved Loftwing crest color.

Version 1.2
• Added the large Heavy variant of the shield.

Version 1.1
• The original version caused a crash (for me anyway, no idea if it was just my game or not actually) when the shield was equipped when either trying to mount a horse or dying (those are the two CTD situations that I know of anyway).  That has been fixed.
• Adjusted Clk variant of OnBack shields.
